::Trinity::

She roared in her loudest kitten roar. She looked as they neared the 
Ark, "Just show me who you want scrapped and I'll scrap them for ya. 
Yup, I sure will."  She was trying her best to be brave, but she felt 
rather scared inside.  She knew that in order for her father to be 
proud of her, she had to prove her bravery in battle.  She was 
determinded to be brave, no matter how much her little legs shook  in 
fear.
